mapper.select: SELECT COMMUTE FROM (SELECT * FROM BB_WORKSTATUS ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT LEAVE_WORK FROM (SELECT * FROM BB_WORKSTATUS ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT WORKDATE FROM (SELECT * FROM BB_WORKSTATUS ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT COUNT(B.COMMUTE) FROM BB_WEEK_WORK_STATISTIC A FULL JOIN BB_WORKSTATUS B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO)
SELECT A.WORKTYPE_TYPE FROM BB_WORKTYPE A WHERE A.WORKTYPE_CODE = 'B1'
SELECT A.WORKSTATUS_NO , A.WORKDATE , A.COMMUTE , A.LEAVE_WORK , A.WORKTYPE_CODE FROM BB_WORKSTATUS A WHERE ROWNUM = 1
